title: My life in a Cave: How to Find Truth by Plato
description: From New York Times best selling author comes a new book about the meaning beind the Allegory of the Cave. GoodReads calls it 'disturbing' and 'did he really cage people and put them in a cave?'

title: The Tears of Immanual Kant
description: One of the rarest things among the ethics community. The tears have been placed in a crystal bottle and should be kept on the person. These tears have the power to force the user to not only always tell the truth at at all time what but to take the moral high ground no matter the consequence. People often yell 'KANT MADE ME DO IT!!' while under the influence. Grants +5 dexterity

title: Ethicical Zoltar Machine
description: This Zoltar Machine is unlike any other! We have a huge variety with all sorts of ethcial frameworks. All the answers for our Christan virtues one say 'What would Jesus Do?' While the Socrates says 'I am Gods gift to the world, you are all stupid, they made me drink hemlock'
